channel.title: Need help fixing some anims for my Pi using trisida v3 client
channel.description:
Basically the bersker helms look bad, and some other stuff like skiller robes, its hard to explain. Can anyone please help me work with models and stuff? I'm a quick learner and would appericate being thought how to fix anims and ect. Please add me on skype : eddie.samoylik
Btw I will tip in some cash tip if anyone helps me out :)

item.title: Need help fixing some anims for my Pi using trisida v3 client
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“I Smoke Kush, post:4, topic:546697”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=665595.msg4449716#msg4449716 date=1410647548]
Not allowed to offer cash, and please don’t put your Skype on here and ask people to add you to help them, for one nobody who knows anything (usually) won’t do that, so you’ll just get a bunch of useless adds with bad help, and two you should find the solution on here so others who search this can find the solution.

OT: What the above user posted.
[/quote]

Ok, so I basically tranfered the skill tab code in rsinterface and tranfered the cache interfaces from another client and the skill tab was well ordered but the client got and error and everything freezes after like 3 secs…[/quote]
You’re probably missing media.
Whether it be sprites, or models, it sounds like you forgot something…

Post the errors if you want some actual help, we can’t help much by assuming…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help fixing some anims for my Pi using trisida v3 client
